content.question: Assume an economy produces two goods, capital goods and consumer goods. If the production of capital goods increases in the current period, which of the following will occur for the current and future production possibilities curve <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>PPC</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> for consumer goods and capital goods?

choices.label: A movement along the current <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and a leftward shift of the future <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

A movement along the current <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and a rightward shift of the future <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

A rightward shift of the current <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and a leftward shift of the future <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

A rightward shift of the current <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and a rightward shift of the future <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

A movement along the current <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> with no shift of the future <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: A movement along the current <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and a rightward shift of the future <math alttext="P P C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PPC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
